General.Name: Guangdong Dongpeng Holdings
General.Description: Guangdong Dongpeng Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of building and sanitary ceramic products in China and internationally. The company offers ceramic tiles and sanitary ware. It sells its products under the Dongpeng brand name. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Foshan, China. Guangdong Dongpeng Holdings Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Sequoia China Investment Management LLP
General.Address: No.8 JiangWan Third Road, Foshan, China
